overview: Down at the local savings and loan there are several ways to secure a loan, and not all of them have to do with good credit. Instead, head loan officer Bionca and her two henchmen, Marc Wallice and Peter North, are willing to make special deals with certain sexy customers. This being a porn video, these special deals generally have to do with scorching rounds of coital congress. Around this storyline capers and cavorts some absolutely blistering erotic action. Bionca and Heather Lere set the screen alight in one such encounter, in which both ladies turn in one of the most intense girl-girl scenes ever. Bionca is a lady-loving legend in the porn community, and Heather is an epic beauty. When they connect, the screen explodes. Look too for Madison's monster outing here, during which she shines like the superstar she is, and Tamara Lee's own incendiary tryst with a strapping stud. This is must-see pornography starring some of the porn world's biggest and brightest stars.
title: Sex Appraisals
